headline: Expand Energy (NasdaqGS:EXE) Reports Higher Revenue But Posts US$249 Million Net Loss
summary: Expand Energy (NasdaqGS:EXE) announced its quarterly dividend affirmation and reported a net loss of $249 million in Q1 2025, despite a significant revenue increase. The company’s share price moved up by 4.78% over the last quarter. This gain aligns with broader market trends, as the market rose 5.2% over the same period. Notably, inclusion in multiple indices, like the S&P 500, likely provided upward momentum and investor attention. While the economic conditions reflected by lower GDP and...

headline: Expand: 2%-Plus Gas OFS Deflation if Permian Cuts Rigs, Frac Crews
summary: Reduced prices for goods and services may come as Permian Basin and other oil-focused E&Ps drop rigs and frac crews at $60 oil, Expand Energy executives said.

headline: Expand Energy on track to increase US natgas output to meet growing demand
summary: U.S. energy company Expand Energy, the country'sbiggest natural gas producer, said on Wednesday it was on trackto produce more gas in 2025 and 2026 to meet growing demand forthe fuel. ...
